progression_balancing.description:
A system that can move progression earlier, to try and prevent the player from getting stuck and bored early.
A lower setting means more getting stuck. A higher setting means less getting stuck.

accessibility.description:
Set rules for reachability of your items/locations.
Locations: ensure everything can be reached and acquired.
Items: ensure all logically relevant items can be acquired.
Minimal: ensure what is needed to reach your goal can be acquired.

priority_locations.description: Prevent these locations from having an unimportant item

RandomizeDreamers.description: Allow for Dreamers to be randomized into the item pool and opens their locations for randomization.

RandomizeSkills.description:
Allow for Skills, such as Mantis Claw or Shade Soul, to be randomized into the item pool. Also opens their locations
for receiving randomized items.

RandomizeFocus.description: Removes the ability to focus and randomizes it into the item pool.

RandomizeSwim.description: Removes the ability to swim in water and randomizes it into the item pool.

RandomizeCharms.description:
Allow for Charms to be randomized into the item pool and open their locations for randomization. Includes Charms
sold in shops.

RandomizeKeys.description: Allow for Keys to be randomized into the item pool. Includes those sold in shops.

RandomizeMaskShards.description: Allow for Mask Shard to be randomized into the item pool and open their locations for randomization.

RandomizeVesselFragments.description: Allow for Vessel Fragments to be randomized into the item pool and open their locations for randomization.

RandomizeCharmNotches.description: Allow for Charm Notches to be randomized into the item pool. Includes those sold by Salubra.

RandomizePaleOre.description: Randomize Pale Ores into the item pool and open their locations for randomization.

RandomizeGeoChests.description: Allow for Geo Chests to contain randomized items, as well as their Geo reward being randomized into the item pool.

RandomizeJunkPitChests.description: Randomize the contents of junk pit chests into the item pool and open their locations for randomization.

RandomizeRancidEggs.description: Randomize Rancid Eggs into the item pool and open their locations for randomization

RandomizeRelics.description: Randomize Relics (King's Idol, et al.) into the item pool and open their locations for randomization.

RandomizeWhisperingRoots.description:
Randomize the essence rewards from Whispering Roots into the item pool. Whispering Roots will now grant a randomized
item when completed. This can be previewed by standing on the root.

RandomizeBossEssence.description:
Randomize boss essence drops, such as those for defeating Warrior Dreams, into the item pool and open their locations
for randomization.

RandomizeGrubs.description: Randomize Grubs into the item pool and open their locations for randomization.

RandomizeMimics.description:
Randomize Mimic Grubs into the item pool and open their locations for randomization.Mimic Grubs are always placed
in your own game.

RandomizeMaps.description:
Randomize Maps into the item pool. This causes Cornifer to give you a message allowing you to see and buy an item
that is randomized into that location as well.

RandomizeStags.description: Randomize Stag Stations unlocks into the item pool as well as placing randomized items on the stag station bell/toll.

RandomizeLifebloodCocoons.description: Randomize Lifeblood Cocoon grants into the item pool and open their locations for randomization.

RandomizeGrimmkinFlames.description: Randomize Grimmkin Flames into the item pool and open their locations for randomization.

RandomizeJournalEntries.description:
Randomize the Hunter's Journal as well as the findable journal entries into the item pool, and open their locations
for randomization. Does not include journal entries gained by killing enemies.

RandomizeNail.description: Removes the ability to swing the nail left, right and up, and shuffles these into the item pool.

RandomizeGeoRocks.description: Randomize Geo Rock rewards into the item pool and open their locations for randomization.

RandomizeBossGeo.description: Randomize boss Geo drops into the item pool and open those locations for randomization.

RandomizeSoulTotems.description: Randomize Soul Refill items into the item pool and open the Soul Totem locations for randomization.

RandomizeLoreTablets.description:
Randomize Lore items into the itempool, one per Lore Tablet, and place randomized item grants on the tablets themselves.
You must still read the tablet to get the item.

RandomizeElevatorPass.description:
Adds an Elevator Pass item to the item pool, which is then required to use the large elevators connecting
City of Tears to the Forgotten Crossroads and Resting Grounds.

PreciseMovement.description:
Places skips into logic which require extremely precise player movement, possibly without movement skills such as
dash or hook.

ProficientCombat.description: Places skips into logic which require proficient combat, possibly with limited items.

BackgroundObjectPogos.description: Places skips into logic for locations which are reachable via pogoing off of background objects.

EnemyPogos.description: Places skips into logic for locations which are reachable via pogos off of enemies.

ObscureSkips.description: Places skips into logic which are considered obscure enough that a beginner is not expected to know them.

ShadeSkips.description: Places shade skips into logic which utilize the player's shade for pogoing or damage boosting.

InfectionSkips.description: Places skips into logic which are only possible after the crossroads become infected.

FireballSkips.description: Places skips into logic which require the use of spells to reset fall speed while in mid-air.

SpikeTunnels.description: Places skips into logic which require the navigation of narrow tunnels filled with spikes.

AcidSkips.description: Places skips into logic which require crossing a pool of acid without Isma's Tear, or water if swim is disabled.

DamageBoosts.description: Places skips into logic which require you to take damage from an enemy or hazard to progress.

DangerousSkips.description: Places skips into logic which contain a high risk of taking damage.

DarkRooms.description: Places skips into logic which require navigating dark rooms without the use of the Lumafly Lantern.

ComplexSkips.description: Places skips into logic which require intense setup or are obscure even beyond advanced skip standards.

DifficultSkips.description: Places skips into logic which are considered more difficult than typical.

RemoveSpellUpgrades.description: Removes the second level of all spells from the item pool.

StartLocation.description: Choose your start location. This is currently only locked to King's Pass.

Goal.description: The goal required of you in order to complete your run in Archipelago.

WhitePalace.description:
Whether or not to include White Palace or not.  Note: Even if excluded, the King Fragment check may still be
required if charms are vanilla.

StartingGeo.description: The amount of starting geo you have.

DeathLink.description:
When you die, everyone dies. Of course the reverse is true too.
When enabled, choose how incoming deathlinks are handled:
vanilla: DeathLink kills you and is just like any other death.  RIP your previous shade and geo.
shadeless: DeathLink kills you, but no shade spawns and no geo is lost.  Your previous shade, if any, is untouched.
shade: DeathLink functions like a normal death if you do not already have a shade, shadeless otherwise.

MinimumGeoPrice.description: The minimum geo price for items in geo shops.

MaximumGeoPrice.description: The maximum geo price for items in geo shops.

MinimumGrubPrice.description: The minimum grub price in the range of prices that an item should cost from Grubfather.

MaximumGrubPrice.description: The maximum grub price in the range of prices that an item should cost from Grubfather.

MinimumEssencePrice.description: The minimum essence price in the range of prices that an item should cost from Seer.

MaximumEssencePrice.description: The maximum essence price in the range of prices that an item should cost from Seer.

MinimumCharmPrice.description:
The minimum charm price in the range of prices that an item should cost for Salubra's shop item which also
carry a charm cost.

MaximumCharmPrice.description:
The maximum charm price in the range of prices that an item should cost for Salubra's shop item which also
carry a charm cost.

RandomCharmCosts.description:
Total Notch Cost of all Charms together. Vanilla sums to 90.
This value is distributed among all charms in a random fashion.
Special Cases:
Set to -1 or vanilla for vanilla costs.
Set to -2 or shuffle to shuffle around the vanilla costs to different charms.

MinimumEggPrice.description:
The minimum rancid egg price in the range of prices that an item should cost from Jiji.
Only takes effect if the EggSlotShops option is greater than 0.

MaximumEggPrice.description:
The maximum rancid egg price in the range of prices that an item should cost from Jiji.
Only takes effect if the EggSlotShops option is greater than 0.

EggShopSlots.description: For each slot, add a location to the Egg Shop and a filler item to the item pool.

SlyShopSlots.description: For each extra slot, add a location to the Sly Shop and a filler item to the item pool.

SlyKeyShopSlots.description:
For each extra slot, add a location to the Sly Shop (requiring Shopkeeper's Key) and a filler item to the item
pool.

IseldaShopSlots.description: For each extra slot, add a location to the Iselda Shop and a filler item to the item pool.

SalubraShopSlots.description: For each extra slot, add a location to the Salubra Shop, and a filler item to the item pool.

SalubraCharmShopSlots.description:
For each extra slot, add a location to the Salubra Shop (requiring Charms), and a filler item to the item
pool.

LegEaterShopSlots.description: For each extra slot, add a location to the Leg Eater Shop and a filler item to the item pool.

GrubfatherRewardSlots.description: For each extra slot, add a location to the Grubfather and a filler item to the item pool.

SeerRewardSlots.description: For each extra slot, add a location to the Seer and a filler item to the item pool.

ExtraShopSlots.description:
For each extra slot, add a location to a randomly chosen shop a filler item to the item pool.

The Egg Shop will be excluded from this list unless it has at least one item.

Shops are capped at 16 items each.

SplitCrystalHeart.description: Splits the Crystal Heart into left- and right-only versions of the item.

SplitMothwingCloak.description:
Splits the Mothwing Cloak into left- and right-only versions of the item. Randomly adds a second left or
right Mothwing cloak item which functions as the upgrade to Shade Cloak.

SplitMantisClaw.description: Splits the Mantis Claw into left- and right-only versions of the item.

CostSanity.description:
If enabled, most locations with costs (like stag stations) will have randomly determined costs.
If set to shopsonly, CostSanity will only apply to shops (including Grubfather, Seer and Egg Shop).
If set to notshops, CostSanity will only apply to non-shops (e.g. Stag stations and Cornifer locations)

These costs can be in Geo (except Grubfather, Seer and Eggshop), Grubs, Charms, Essence and/or Rancid Eggs

CostSanityHybridChance.description: The chance that a CostSanity cost will include two components instead of one, e.g. Grubs + Essence

CostSanityEggWeight.description: The likelihood of Costsanity choosing a Egg cost. Chosen as a sum of all weights from other types.

CostSanityGrubWeight.description: The likelihood of Costsanity choosing a Grub cost. Chosen as a sum of all weights from other types.

CostSanityEssenceWeight.description: The likelihood of Costsanity choosing a Essence cost. Chosen as a sum of all weights from other types.

CostSanityCharmWeight.description: The likelihood of Costsanity choosing a Charm cost. Chosen as a sum of all weights from other types.

CostSanityGeoWeight.description: The likelihood of Costsanity choosing a Geo cost. Chosen as a sum of all weights from other types.
